file_insights.changes: Added benchmark configurations with harness=false for 7 distinct experiment groups
key_additions: Configured 7 benchmark groups: baseline, running stat, EMA fusion, rolling extrema, plan overhead, memory writes, end-to-end

file_insights.changes: Created new common benchmarking utilities module
key_additions: Added helper functions and constants for benchmark setup

patterns_discovered: Systematic benchmarking approach with standardized data sizes
Configurable benchmark parameters based on data size
Modular benchmarking utilities with reproducibility considerations
Comprehensive test coverage for benchmark configurations
gotchas_discovered: Need to adjust sample sizes and measurement times for different data sizes
Importance of using constant seed for reproducible benchmark data
Potential performance variance across different dataset scales

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Configure Criterion benchmarking with harness=false and standard data sizes

recommendations: Use provided DATA_SIZES constant for comprehensive performance testing
Leverage sample_size_for_data_size() for adaptive benchmark sampling
Utilize format_size() for consistent size representation in benchmark IDs
Consider QUICK_DATA_SIZES for faster development iteration
